title: Mikel Landa Exits Giro d’Italia Stage 1 with a Fractured Back, Ending GC Hopes
content:
The multi-time Giro stage winner was hit by bad luck on opening day as other GC hopefuls remained upright but lost time.

Read the full article at Mikel Landa Exits Giro d’Italia Stage 1 with a Fractured Back, Ending GC Hopes on Velo.
author: sstokes
